description:
After Nationals and before attending the U-17 Japanese team training camp, the middle schoolers enjoy a moment of free time. Tezuka goes lure fishing with his grandfather Kunikazu. Oshitari Yushi and Kenya get heated over a lottery in a shopping mall. Shiraishi is told a shocking truth by his sister Yukari as he cares for his rhinoceros beetle.
Source: crunchyroll
